_header: Through his hand with hammer knack they made a grisly wound
_description: Latter portion of a poem on the Passion — 69 lines in six-line stanzas with ‘O and I’ refrain

BodAsh41.Editions:
Hammerle,  Karl. 
             “Verstreute me und frühne Lyrik.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
